desc: Sniff Relief is the world's first self-heating face mask designed to act as a natural remedy for stuffy nose, sinus congestion relief or sinusitis.

layout.text: Are You Sick Of Having Stuffy Noses And Sinuses?
Sniff Relief uses heat to target your swollen blood vessels to calm your sinuses and by removing your discomfort within 10-15 minutes of wearing the mask.
